Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Racine
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains trains are running w/significant delays following earlier signal problems near 95th/Dan Ryan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains trains are running w/significant delays following earlier signal problems near 95th/Dan Ryan. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Belmont due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Belmont due to track conditions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 buses Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Ogden, Sacramento, Roosevelt, California due to street blockage near California/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Ogden, Sacramento, Roosevelt, California due to street blockage near California/Roosevelt.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
